message.content: I found it! The port is hardcoded to 5000 on line 978. Let me modify it to use a different port:

function.arguments: {"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py", "old_str": "    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=is_debug_mode)", "new_str": "    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5001, debug=is_debug_mode)", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   975	    # The scheduler is already started in the global scope.
   976	    is_debug_mode = os.environ.get('FLASK_DEBUG', '0') == '1'
   977	    logger.info(f"Starting Flask app (Debug mode: {is_debug_mode})")
   978	    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5001, debug=is_debug_mode)
   979	    
   980	    logger.info("SheepVibes application finished.")
   981	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py
+++ /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py
@@ -978 +978 @@
-    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=is_debug_mode)
+    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5001, debug=is_debug_mode)
